entry.title: Spark View Engine for Monorail3
entry.content:
Hamilton Verissimo currently develops a next version of Monorail, which uses a new view engine called Blade. As much as I’d love to use Monorail 3 in the (near) future, Spark is bound to stay my view engine of choice.

Unfortunately Monorail 3 is a complete rewrite in F# and the current Spark won’t work out of the box and a new library is needed. Thus I forked the Monorail3 git repository (you can find it at https://github.com/ploosqva/Castle.MonoRail3, where I will slowly implement features found in the current Spark for Monorail 2.x.

I will post some notes on the progress on this blog. Below is the list of current posts on that subject:

  1. Castle Blade’s nested transitions with Spark
